about_the_game:
Overview:

Ever since the Nature's Legacy Institute opened its doors to the public, visitors and staff alike have been baffled - a series of inexplicable food thefts by a furry trio of raccoons! These masked marauders have taken it upon themselves to liberate the museum's culinary treasures from the garbage cans, sparking a battle of wits and mischief within the halls of the museum.

Play as Crafty Raccoons:

Step into the paws of a crafty raccoon and embark on a daring mission to obtain the delectable delights hidden within the museum's walls. Whether you choose to operate solo, lurking in the shadows and evading detection, or assemble a team of like-minded rascals to pose as a human and infiltrate the museum as a visitor, your objective remains singular: locate the coveted hamburger using your wits and "cutting-edge" raccoon technology, and execute a daring escape to enjoy the spoils of your heist. But beware, for the museum staff are ever vigilant, and one misstep could lead to capture!

Play as the Museum Staff:

As a member of the dedicated museum staff, it falls upon you to thwart the pesky raccoons' antics and restore order to Nature's Legacy Institute. Armed with an array of resources at your disposal, including the museum's "state-of-the-art" security camera system and your own cunning instincts, you must identify and apprehend these furry felons before they can wreak further havoc. Engage in a thrilling game of raccoon-and-human as you strategize and collaborate to outsmart your wily adversaries and safeguard the museum's precious artifacts and provisions.

Trash Can Tactics:

In Trash Can Tactics, the ultimate battle of wits between raccoons and humans unfolds amidst the backdrop of Nature's Legacy Institute. With each encounter, players will unlock secrets, abilities, and appearances, enhancing their gameplay experience and letting them play they way they want to. Whether you choose to embrace the mischievous spirit of the raccoons or uphold the honor and order of the museum staff, one thing is certain: in this world of culinary capers, to the victor goes the delicious spoils!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6820HQ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX980M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • VR Support: Not supported

short_description: Ever since the Nature's Legacy Institute has opened their doors to all, there have been an odd string of thefts - not of rare artifacts, but rather of the food from the cafeteria. Play as either a museum staff member, or an intelligent raccoon, in this asymmetrical PvP heist game.
